summary: Government school website with main public pages and a secure, password-protected admin panel for managing site content.
architectural_notes: Include password-based authentication for admin access and restrict admin routes/URLs from public access.
Separate public site pages from admin dashboard for content management.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Government school emblem/crest style logo, flat vector look (school-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero banner illustration of a government school campus building with students, clean minimal style (hero-campus.dim_1600x600.png)
- Set of simple outline icons for: admissions, academics, staff, notices, gallery, contact (school-icons.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create the public-facing government school website with a complete navigation and pages/sections: Home, About the School, Admissions, Academics, Staff/Faculty, News & Notices, Gallery, and Contact.
Implement a consistent visual theme for the site (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for an official government school identity, and apply it across all pages.

Build a password-protected admin panel that allows authorized admins to manage site content (create/edit/delete staff entries, notices/news posts, gallery items, and edit page content blocks and contact details).
Protect access to the admin panel and its URL by requiring a password before showing admin content; unauthenticated users must not be able to view admin dashboard screens or perform admin operations.
Add an admin settings capability to change the admin password (requiring the current password), with the password stored securely in the backend (hashed, not plaintext).
Add a Contact page form that lets visitors submit inquiries to the school; store submissions in the backend and allow admins to view and delete them in the admin panel.
Add gallery support where public users can view a gallery grid and admins can add/remove gallery entries, including support for linking to image assets stored as frontend static files.
Add a News & Notices system where admins can publish notices (title, body, date) and the public site shows a list view and detail view.

Generate and include required static images in the frontend (placed in frontend/public/assets/generated) and use them in the site (header/footer/hero as appropriate) without routing image delivery through the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build public-facing government school website with all main pages/sections (e.g., Home, About, Admissions, Academics, Staff, News/Notices, Gallery, Contact)
Create secure admin panel for managing website content
Protect admin panel URL and access with password-based authentication

Implement backend content models and canister APIs to store and retrieve all website content needed for the public pages (school profile text, admissions info, academics info, staff list, notices/news posts, gallery items, contact details).

projectName: Government school website with public pages and password-protected admin panel
